title: GOFLAME Electric Oil Filled Radiator Heater with Wheels, Portable Space Heater with Adjustable Thermostat, Tip-over & Overheated Protection, Energy Saving Mini Heater for Home and Office, 1500W
features: Efficient Heating & Adjustable thermostat: With 7 oil-filled thermal slots, which is 5.7" width and filled with 4.2 lbs oil, our radiator heater provides energy-efficient heating for medium to large rooms that need constant heat in the winter. The heater equips with 3 heat setting(600w, 900w,1500w) and adjustable thermostat, you can adjust the temperature according your heating needs.

Silent in Operation: Silent operation makes it perfect for any room, because it won't bother you from work, sleep, chat or anything. Especially in night when you are in sleep, it will give you a beautiful dream without making any noise. The heater is permanently sealed with oil and it’s never need to be refilled.

Convenient to Move and Storage: Equipped with four heavy-duty caster wheels, our space heater provides easy movement to any room you want. And when the winter passed, you can take the base off and wrap the cord in the front of the heater, which ensures tidy and make the storage much easier.

Safety Guarantee: The heater will shut off automatically when it's overheated. And when the heater tips over, it will also shut off immediately. Thermal slots maintain a low surface temperature, don't worry that you will be scalded accidently.
Best for Small room: With the compact design, this radiator heater is suitable for any small room. It's your best choice in cold weather.
description: Effectively and quickly heat any room of the house with the timer oil-filled radiator. Want immediate relief from the cold in the shortest time possible? This heater's unique design allows heated air to rise faster and gain high speed, producing hotter air than a standard oil-filled radiator. The user-friendly control panel offers an adjustable thermostat and three heat settings to customize your heating needs and optimize energy-efficient operation. A gently rounded design, and a thermal cut-off function that automatically turns the heater off if it starts to overheat. With its sleek look and silent operation, the oil-filled radiator is the perfect solution to all your heating needs.

Quiet heater serves as an alternative heat source in small and medium roomsThree power settings allow flexibility for diverse rooms and personal heating needsHeater also automatically shuts off upon overheatingFour wheels enable easy transportation from one room to anotherThe user-friendly control panel offers an adjustable thermostat and three heat settingsThe light will be turned on while the heating element is workingWith a carrying handle
